summary: 2000 TUNDRA - UNCONTROLLABLE VIBRATIONS UPON BRAKING.  IN 3/02 I BROUGHT TRUCK TO TOYOTA DEALER TO ADDRESS PROBLEM.  THEY MACHINED FRONT ROTORS AND REPLACED FRONT PADS.  I QUESTIONED IF THIS WOULD BE EFFECTIVE. PROBLEM CONTINUED WITHIN 6 MONTHS. DEALER NOW OFFERING TO REPLACE ALL FRONT BRAKE HARDWARE FOR $520.00. BEING SCREWED IN CALIFORNIA.              *JB
